lead_paragraph: A judge has rejected prosecutors’ request to force a Baltimore police officer to testify against three of his colleagues facing charges in connection with Freddie Gray’s death.

headline.print_headline: Maryland: Judge Will Not Force Officer to Testify
headline.main: Maryland: Judge Will Not Force Officer to Testify

snippet: A judge has rejected prosecutors’ request to force a Baltimore police officer to testify against three of his colleagues facing charges in connection with Freddie Gray’s death.
abstract: Baltimore judge denies prosecutor's request to force police officer William G Porter to testify in trial against three colleagues facing charges related to Freddie Gray's death.
